summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 22E, page 76, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Lake Union Addition, north 40 ft. of Lot 3, Block 1, located approximately 90 ft. south from southwest corner of No. 45th St. on Meridian Ave., as Community Business (BC) Zone.
